result.eng: Dhe bought a loaf of bread.
result.html: Cheannaigh sí bollóg aráinDhe bought a loaf of bread.
result.ponchtml: Ċeannaiġ sí bollóg aráinDhe bought a loaf of bread.

result.eng: A little later in the day he bought some bread.
result.ga: Nuair a tháinig as an lá cheannaigh sé giota aráin
result.orig: Nuair a tháinig as an lá cheannaigh sé giota aráin
result.html: Nuair a tháinig as an lá cheannaigh sé giota aráinA little later in the day he bought some bread.
result.ponchtml: Nuair a ṫáinig as an lá ċeannaiġ sé giota aráinA little later in the day he bought some bread.
